entities.description: The number of days female respondents had 4 or more drinks on the same occasion in the past 30 days; for male respondents, 5 or more drinks.
The specific date when the survey was filled out, marked as [DATEFILL].
The general instance of consuming 4 or 5+ drinks on the same occasion in the past 30 days.
Categorical description of how frequently the respondents had 4 or more (female) or 5 or more (male) drinks on the same occasion in the past 30 days.
Numerical value indicating how many days the respondents reported 4 or more (female) or 5 or more (male) drinks on the same occasion in the past 30 days.
The response code representing different scenarios such as 'Never Use Alcohol', 'Did Not Use Alcohol In The Past 30 Days', and others.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the specific date it was filled out.
The survey variable assessing the frequency of consuming 4 or 5+ drinks on the same occasion in the past 30 days.
Indicates the number of days the respondent had 4 or more (female) or 5 or more (male) drinks on the same occasion in the past 30 days.
Categorizes the frequency of alcohol consumption based on the number of days reported.
Links the survey variable to the specific response code indicating different alcohol use scenarios.
